# Tambo

> Build agents that speak your UI

Tambo is an open-source toolkit for adding AI agents to React applications. It's the missing layer between React and LLMs.

## What Tambo Does

Tambo connects your existing React components to AI agents. The agent renders your UI with the right propsâ€”no separate chat interface needed.

### Core Features

- **Generative UI**: AI agents render your React components with correct props
- **Streaming Support**: Real-time streaming built-in
- **State Management**: Handles complex state across agent interactions
- **MCP-Native**: Full Model Context Protocol support
- **Message History**: Persistent conversation threads
- **Tool Orchestration**: Coordinate multiple tools seamlessly
- **Model Flexibility**: Works with various LLM providers
- **Agent-Native Auth**: Agents inherit user permissions

## Quick Start

```bash
npm create tambo-app
```

Or add to an existing project:

```bash
npm install @tambo-ai/react
```

## Resources

- Documentation: https://docs.tambo.co
- GitHub: https://github.com/tambo-ai/tambo
- Component Library: https://ui.tambo.co
- Discord: https://discord.com/invite/dJNvPEHth6
- Twitter: https://x.com/tambo_ai

## Pricing

- **Starter**: Free forever (self-hosted)
- **Growth**: $25/month (managed infrastructure)
- **Enterprise**: Custom pricing

## Built With Tambo

Examples of apps built with Tambo:
- db-thing: Natural language SQL query interface
- Strudel AI: AI-powered music creation
- CheatSheet: AI document assistant

## About

Tambo is developed by Fractal Dynamics Inc. The toolkit is open-source and free to self-host forever.

Website: https://tambo.co
